name: Moots AI
headline: AI-powered contact app for dealmakers
description: Moots is an AI-powered networking and relationship management app designed to help professionals, super-connectors, and entrepreneurs track, manage, and leverage their relationships efficiently. Moots goes beyond traditional contact management by capturing both online and offline interactions, enabling users to remember key personal details and business contexts. It provides a seamless way to manage introductions, track interactions, and utilize AI to surface important insights, helping users nurture valuable connections over time.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:collaboration; industry:social-media; industry:social-network; industry:ai-assistant; location:new-york

founders.name: Tonjé Bakang Tonje, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder/CEO at Moots AI.
Second time YC founder. Former CEO at Afrostream. Scaled business operations to 28 countries and spent over 15 years as a content creator and entrepreneur in the entertainment industry.

founders.name: German Saprykin, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder at OnScale
Led 3 platform teams to support a few hundreds mobile developers at Grab, Southeast Asia’s leading superapp​​. Previously he architected and built several mobile applications generating millions of downloads.

# Track, manage, and leverage your relationships to close more deals
AI-powered contact app for dealmakers and super connectors
[ Join the Waitlist ](https://www.moots.ai/<https:/kbmyl6786ny.typeform.com/waitlist>)
![](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/66e9c98b1640763cd3f9400f/a6303556-fa63-467e-9091-e25786ff2826/IMG_6101.JPG)
### No more missed opportunities 
No more missed opportunities Moots identifies contacts that can help you, suggests optimal ways to reach them, and guides you on what to say. 
### No more dormant contacts 
Moots connects your objectives to your network by integrating data from your contacts, notes, emails, calendars, and social media interactions, automatically enriching each contact's dossier.
[ Join the Waitlist ](https://www.moots.ai/<https:/kbmyl6786ny.typeform.com/waitlist>)

## Contact's Dossiers
Gather in-depth insights on your contacts, discovering hidden connections.
  * ![An icon of the ChatGPT logo.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/66e9c98b1640763cd3f9400f/1726597516667-UXQ94JPGY9QMS7D5L4V9/icon-3.png)
## Identify Relevant Contacts
Find the most pertinent contacts based on your goals, location, industry, and interaction history.
  * ![An icon of a notification bell.](https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/66e9c98b1640763cd3f9400f/1726597516662-ECNFX9CVLNPH8WZ5387U/icon-1.png)
## Efficient Follow-Ups
Use AI-generated summaries and reminders to never miss an opportunity.

generated_description:
**Moots AI: Navigating Connections with AI Precision**

Founded in 2021 and kickstarted through Y Combinator's W22 batch, Moots AI offers a unique solution for dealmakers and super-connectors. This New York City-based startup has streamlined networking with an AI-powered contact management app that promises to tackle the often clunky process of relationship management.

At its core, Moots AI is all about elevating how professionals interact and maintain connections. It does this by capturing both online and offline interactions, which lets users keep track of key details that can make or break opportunities. The app goes a step further by integrating various data sources—contacts, notes, emails, calendars, and social media—to enrich the user's understanding of their connections.

The key benefits? No more missed opportunities or dormant contacts. Moots AI helps identify influential contacts and suggests optimal ways to engage with them based on specific goals and contexts. Features like contact dossiers and AI-generated summaries streamline follow-ups, ensuring that users are primed to take action when the moment is right. 

It's a small team of three pushing this ambitious vision forward, proving that even nimble operations can have a significant impact. With tags like 'artificial-intelligence,' 'social-network,' and 'ai-assistant,' Moots AI is positioning itself squarely in the intersection of tech and networking.

If you're curious to see how AI can transform your networking strategy, check them out at [Moots.AI](https://www.moots.ai/) and consider joining their waitlist. After all, in today's fast-paced professional landscape, leveraging relationships efficiently might just be your golden ticket to success.
